text:
Gabriel Bacquier (17 May 1924 – 13 May 2020) was a French operatic baritone. He was a long-term member of the Opéra-Comique and the Paris Opera. He also appeared at leading opera houses in Europe and the United States.
Bacquier made his American debut at the Lyric Opera of Chicago in 1962 as the High Priest in "Samson et Dalila" by Saint-Saëns.
Bacquier died on 13 May 2020, aged 95.
